metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3132 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Double free vulnerability in the SplDoublyLinkedList::offsetSet function inext/spl/spl_dllist.c in PHP 7.x before 7.0.6 allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code via a crafted index.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3132` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.0 - 7.0.4-7ubuntu2.1
libphp7.0-embed - 7.0.4-7ubuntu2.1
php7.0 - 7.0.4-7ubuntu2.1
php7.0-bcmath - 7.0.4-7ubuntu2.1
php7.0-bz2 - 7.0.4-7ubuntu2.1

criterions.comment: php7.0 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.4-7ubuntu2.1').
